title: Dualitime
description:
As part of the Game Jam 2022, a friend and I created Dualitime. The theme was duality, and from that we designed a puzzle game where you maneuver your character through a room and reverse time to create a copy of yourself. This clone can then assist in solving puzzles by flicking levers, pushing buttons, and helping navigate the environment. In addition to programming, I also contributed all 3D assets used in the game.

  • Conception
  • Programming
  • 3D Modelling
  • Year: 2022
  • Platform: PC
  • Engine: Unity
